word:
(321)Oct. 3, 1908.-6-      Sanitarium, Calif. B-304-'06                  Sept. 14, 1906. 

Dear Brother and Sister Burden:- 
     I cannot sleep after one o'clock. We left St. Helena on Friday morning to spend Sabbath and Sunday in Oakland. I spoke both afternoons in the tent. On Sabbath afternoon the tent was filled, mostly with our own people; and all present were interested. I had special freedom in speaking from the seventh chapter of Revelation. This is a most interesting chapter.
